abstract: The COVID-19 pandemic opens up new questions for the inclusion of people with disabilities, at work and in crisis response and recovery. My recently published journal paper highlights the experiences of people with various types of disabilities in the workplace, as well as the importance of access to healthcare.

shorttitle: Disability and Labour Markets in Indonesia
